SEARCH
Package com.rikuthin.entities

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
com.rikuthin.entities.Entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Renderable, Updateable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BulletSpawner, MobileEntity
public abstract class Entity extends Object implements Updateable, Renderable
Represents a base entity in the game, providing common functionality for all objects within the game world. This class handles entity position, animation, collision detection, hit points, and rendering.

The entity can be fully customized through the builder pattern, supporting features such as animations, speed, invisibility, and collision handling.

Entities may interact with other entities and are capable of rendering themselves within a game panel.

    • setAnimationKeys

      public final void setAnimationKeys(Set<String> animationKeys) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Sets the set of keys this entity can query AnimationTemplateRepository with.
      Parameters:
      animationKeys - The set of animation keys.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if, when a non-null set is passed, it contains null or blank keys, or contains a key that doesn't exist in AnimationTemplateRepository's key set.

    • setAnimation

      public final void setAnimation(String key) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Sets the animation for the entity.

      Key must either be null (for no animation) or a valid (non-blank) string.

      Valid strings must be a AnimationTemplate key within AnimationTemplateRepository and must exist within the entity's current key set.

      Parameters:
      key - The key identifying the animation.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the provided key (when not null) is blank, is not within the entity's animation key set, or does not map to a loaded template within AnimationTemplateRepository.

    • setHitboxFromCurrentSprite

      public final void setHitboxFromCurrentSprite()
      Updates the hitbox dimensions based on the current sprite. The hitbox is adjusted to match the width and height of the sprite.

    • setHitboxFromRectangle

      public final void setHitboxFromRectangle(Rectangle rectangle)
      Updates the hitbox dimensions based on the provided Rectangle.
      Parameters:
      rectangle - The Rectangle object to create the hitbox from.

    • setMaxHitPoints

      protected final void setMaxHitPoints(int maxHitPoints) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Sets the maximum hit points of the entity.

      The new value cannot be negative/less than zero (0).

      Parameters:
      maxHitPoints - The new maximum hit points value
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the new value is less than zero (0).

    • setCurrentHitPoints

      protected final void setCurrentHitPoints(int currentHitPoints) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Sets the current hit points of the entity.

      The new value must fall within the (endpoint-inclusive) range of zero (0) to the entity's current maximum hit point value.

      Parameters:
      currentHitPoints - The new current hit points.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the new is outside the accepted range.

      Returns:
